oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A METHOD FOR ESTIMATING REFLECTION COEFFICIENT IN SHORT-CRESTED RANDOM SEAS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yokoki, Hiromune
Isobe, Masahiko
Watanabe, Akira
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: random seas
reflection coefficient
reflection
short crested waves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A method for estimating the reflection coefficient is developed for practical uses. In the method, a parametric expression of directional spectra is adopted and the parameters in it are estimated by the maximum likelihood method. The validity of the method is verified by applying it to simulated data. The method is also applied to field data, obtained at Oarai Port, Japan.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
